name: Picarto Skinny
description:
Neatly rearranges Picarto to be skinny and vertical, instead of wide.
Perfect for multitasking while watching. Also removes premium ads.

user.name: Sorcerer
user.about:
I just like to change how the web looks.
You're free to modify my styles, just attribute me.
Please email me if any of my styles are broken/out of date so I can fix them.
